lane mcgregor garden father accident put pie mrs mcgregor run along get mischief going old mrs rabbit took basket umbrella went wood baker bought loaf brown bread five currant buns flopsy mopsy cottontail good little bunnies went lane gather blackberries peter naughty ran straight away mcgregor garden squeezed gate first ate lettuces french beans ate radishes feeling rather sick went look parsley round end cucumber frame meet mcgregor mcgregor hands knees planting young cabbages jumped ran peter waving rake calling stop thief peter dreadfully frightened rushed garden forgotten way back gate lost one shoes among cabbages shoe amongst potatoes losing ran four legs went faster think might got away altogether unfortunately run gooseberry net got caught large buttons jacket blue jacket brass buttons quite new peter gave lost shed big tears sobs overheard friendly sparrows flew great excitement implored exert mcgregor came sieve intended pop upon top peter peter wriggled time leaving jacket behind rushed tool shed jumped would beautiful thing hide much water mcgregor quite sure peter somewhere tool shed perhaps hidden underneath flower pot began turn carefully looking presently peter sneezed kertyschoo mcgregor time tried put foot upon peter jumped window upsetting three plants window small mcgregor tired running peter went back work peter sat rest breath trembling fright least idea way also damp sitting time began wander going lippity lippity fast looking round found door wall locked room fat little rabbit squeeze underneath old mouse running stone doorstep carrying peas beans family wood peter asked way gate large pea mouth could answer shook head peter began cry tried find way straight across garden became puzzled presently came pond mcgregor filled water cans white cat staring gold fish sat still tip tail twitched alive peter thought best away without speaking heard cats cousin little benjamin bunny went back towards tool shed suddenly quite close heard noise hoe scr ritch scratch scratch scritch peter scuttered underneath bushes presently nothing happened came climbed upon wheelbarrow peeped first thing saw mcgregor hoeing onions back turned towards peter beyond gate peter got quietly wheelbarrow started running fast could along straight walk behind black currant bushes mcgregor caught sight corner peter care slipped underneath gate safe last
